name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 3.5 - Revenger's Vacation
summary: Caron proposes a seven-day vacation for Noel, who is exhausted from the battle. Noel, who is spending his vacation in an unfamiliar place, eventually decides to search for the owner of the "safe house".... Gather information as you explore the slums at your leisure and find the owner.
